name: Ascender (itch) (Mergeheroes)
description:
A weird bullet hell game where your goal is to ascend acolytes by chanting, but during chanting you are immobile, so be wary! Can you make it to the end?

Made during a 48 hour game jam.

Controls:

W A S D - move

Space - chant

Alt + f4 - quit

Credits:

Sami Salo - programming

Mikael Priuska - environment, 3d

Petri Ruokonen - character 3d

Steady Disaster - 2d, particles, animation

Timo Pyrrö - sound, gameplay design
